ing: 6 1/2 fluid ounces sweet and sour mix
des: "Boredom makes some pretty interesting drinks that taste surprisingly good. This citrus flavored sipper is mild yet potent. It will sneak in and whoop your butt like a little ninja."
ins: Combine the sweet and sour mix, vodka and orange liqueur in a shaker or large glass. Stir, and pour into two glasses with ice.
